name: Memory Hole
description:
DOWNLOADING THE GAME AND PLAYING AS SUCH OR PLAYING IN FULL SCREEN IS RECOMMENDED. The WebGl version is a bit laggy and the edges of the screens are cut if not played in full screen.

Summary:

In the not so far future, there are stations which destroyed robots are reconstructed. However, the recovery process isn't perfect. Memory holes can emerge in the robots as they are being rebuilt. 

As a human, it is your job to look through the data of the robots that are assigned to you and patch these memory holes by reminding them of themselves.
